alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:12AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Logan, Scott, Polk and western Montgomery Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 112 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midland to near Beauchamp to near Wickes. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mena... Booneville... Waldron... Paris... Mansfield... Magazine... Wickes... Grannis... Hatfield... Oden... Ratcliff... Blue Mountain... Vandervoort... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Mountain Fork... Bard Springs Recreation Area... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Opal... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
